solution_line_template: If one meatball is made from {hamburger_per_meatball} pound of hamburger meat, then {total_hamburger} pounds of hamburger meat will make {total_hamburger}/({hamburger_per_meatball})={total_hamburger}*{reciprocal_of_hamburger_per_meatball}=<<{total_hamburger}/({hamburger_per_meatball})={total_meatballs}>>{total_meatballs} meatballs.

{total_meatballs} meatballs divided amongst {num_family_members} family members is {total_meatballs}/{num_family_members}=<<{total_meatballs}/{num_family_members}={meatballs_per_person}>>{meatballs_per_person} meatballs per family member.
